job.title: Software Engineer - Data Solutions RWF
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThis position will support the Customer Excellence enterprise function formed in 2019 which enables a holistic view of critical customer interaction points and partners across lines of business to strengthen the experiences we provide to our customers Specifically this group will identify and implement enhancements defined by the Customer Remediation Center of Excellence business group and constantly look for solutions to improve application performance stability and availability of end to end solution This is a mission critical function that will move the needle on supporting our customers and team members meet the expectations of our regulators and continue to transform the companybrbrThis role is a Senior role within the Customer Remediation Technology team responsible forbrbrApplication DesignbrulliParticipates in application design by providing feedback and guidance on available technology options to business problems specific to sanctions screeningliliProvides
